channel.title: Glitch
channel.description:
Hello I've come across a glitch in game and can't find a reason for it, hoping you can help.
As I entered "surface tension" through the bunker door, I had all the normal weapons including the Tau Cannon. The loading screen popped up as normal and "Surface Tension" appeared on screen for the new chapter but then I took a few steps backwards, the loading screen popped up again, and when it had finished the only weapons I had were the Crowbar, pistols with minimum ammo and a satchel charge...
I assume the Tau cannon is only available for collection at one point in the game so if I continue on from here, I go without it as the autosave over wrote when I re-entered Surface tension.
